TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ImageSelectType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies when the visual style selects a different multiple-image file to draw an element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A visual style can define up to five multiple-image files for an element. These image files are specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty> values <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile1> through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile5>. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType> values indicate when the visual style selects a different image file to draw the element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType> values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType Dpi = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Image file changes are based on dots per inch (DPI) settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The image file does not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType Size = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Image file changes are based on size settings.
